title: PRO Bike Gear updates original Stealth saddle and introduces all-new Curved model
content:
PRO Bike Gear’s Stealth road saddle was in the first wave of the short-nosed, wide rear, aggressive aero-optimized saddles. The Stealth’s popularity led to spin-off versions, including a dedicated TT model and a recently introduced off-road/gravel model. PRO now offers ten models in its Stealth range, all featuring the trademark short/wide nose design with a […]

The post PRO Bike Gear updates original Stealth saddle and introduces all-new Curved model appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jordan Villella
